title: [LOVE] Ep. 275 MAN-ifesting Love 101 with Jaime Bronstein
itunes:title: [LOVE] Ep. 275 MAN-ifesting Love 101 with Jamie Bronstein
description:
Get your copy of Ashley’s new book You Turn at youturnbook.com!

 

Who are you manifesting into your love life?

 

This week, Ash talks to Jaime Bronstein all about how to manifest love into your life. Jaime is an LCSW, relationship expert, and host of the Love Talk Live show on LA Talk Radio.

 

If you feel like there are “no good guys left” or “you only find guys who aren't looking for anything serious,” you may be living in a victim-mode mindset and state of being. Jaime and Ash talk through how to shift into a thriving mode of love, decipher levels of attraction, prepare yourself for the right relationship…and so much more.

 

Whether you are dating, living the full solo life, or in a relationship, Jaime shares the three aspects of yourself to work on to grow your heart and love life.

 

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. How to move from victim mode into thriving mode.  
  2. What you should feel in your body, mind, and heart.
  3. 3 aspects of yourself to work on, whether you are dating or in a relationship.
  4. Phantom exes: what they are, how to handle them, and when to let go.

 

Connect with Jaime Bronstein:

Get a copy of her book MAN*ifesting: A Step-by-Step Guide to Attracting the Love That Is Meant for You

Jaime is gifting a 7 Day of Manifesting Love Series for FREE...CLICK HERE to sign up!
